documentation.text:
@dev Extension of {Governor} for proposal restriction to token holders with a minimum balance.
 _Available since v4.3._

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "GovernorCompatibilityBravo: proposer votes below proposal threshold"

arguments.value: GovernorCompatibilityBravo: proposer votes below proposal threshold

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "GovernorCompatibilityBravo: proposer votes below proposal threshold"

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address[] memory,uint256[] memory,bytes memory[] memory,string memory) returns (uint256)

documentation.text: @dev Part of the Governor Bravo's interface: _"The number of votes required in order for a voter to become a proposer"_.
